visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing market share distribution of passenger auto registrations using a donut-style technique with categorical segmentation
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains four categorical variables (EV, Hybrids, Diesel, Petrol) with percentage values representing market shares. Data is sourced from cleantechnica, a reputable industry publication, ensuring real-world relevance and accuracy. The pie chart effectively communicates part-to-whole relationships, adhering to Tufte's data-ink ratio by using minimal non-essential elements. The donut-style (innerSize: 75%) enhances readability while maintaining proportional accuracy. Cairo's perceptual principles are applied through distinct color contrast and direct percentage labeling. The chart preserves statistical validity with data summing to 100% (±0 rounding variance), using Highcharts' native percentage formatting for precise communication.
